about.title: Urmonov Umidjon Butabekovich
about.desc: Thoracoabdominal oncologist-surgeon, Candidate of Medical Sciences, top-level oncological surgeon

bio.title: Biography
bio.desc: My name is Urmonov Umidjon Butabekovich. I am an oncological surgeon. I perform surgeries for tumors of various localizations, emergency surgical interventions, and diagnostic procedures. Thousands of grateful patients and hundreds of successful surgeries are the result of my daily work.
bio.desc_2: An experienced surgeon with over 13 years of practice in surgery. He always takes on complex cases with confidence. He began his career at a leading medical institution, where he quickly established himself as a reliable specialist. His mentors include: Academician Prof. Choynzonov E.Ts., Academician Prof. Zikiryakhodjaev D.Z., Prof. Afanasyev S.G., Prof. Khakimov G.A., Prof. Tuzikov S.A., Prof. Yuldoshev R.Z., MD Dobrodeev A.Yu., and PhD Volkov M.Yu.

address.title: Tashkent City Branch of the Republican Specialized Scientific-Practical Medical Center of Oncology and Radiology
address.desc: Urmonov Umidjon Butabekovich. All rights reserved.
